name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Lucius SHAIRD, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Lucius SHAIRD, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of October, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Motion to Quash Commonwealth’s Brief in Opposition are hereby DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
934 A.2d 1159
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Lucius SHAIRD, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 16, 2007.
